definitions.definition: A thug ; a usually muscular henchman with little intelligence.
( US , informal ) A hired and paid person who is assigned to terrorize and  kill opponents .
A fool ; someone who is silly , stupid , awkward , or outlandish .
( ice hockey , derogatory ) An enforcer or fighter .
( UK , World War II , PoW slang ) A German guard in a prisoner-of-war camp.
( slang ) One hired to legally kidnap a child and forcibly transport them to a boot camp , boarding school , wilderness therapy , or a similar rehabilitation facility .
( Internet slang ) A member of the comedy website Something Awful .

main_definition: A thug ; a usually muscular henchman with little intelligence.
secondary_definitions: ( US , informal ) A hired and paid person who is assigned to terrorize and  kill opponents .
A fool ; someone who is silly , stupid , awkward , or outlandish .
( ice hockey , derogatory ) An enforcer or fighter .
( UK , World War II , PoW slang ) A German guard in a prisoner-of-war camp.
( slang ) One hired to legally kidnap a child and forcibly transport them to a boot camp , boarding school , wilderness therapy , or a similar rehabilitation facility .
( Internet slang ) A member of the comedy website Something Awful .

definitions.definition: ( countable , Australia , informal ) A wine flagon or cask .
( uncountable , Australia , informal ) Cheap or inferior cask wine .

main_definition: ( countable , Australia , informal ) A wine flagon or cask .
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable , Australia , informal ) Cheap or inferior cask wine .

definitions.definition: A Sino-Japanese kanji pronunciation layer, considered the first Sino-Japanese kanji reading type used in Japan.
examples: The Buddhist term 権化 is read as gonge , using the kanji's goon readings.

main_definition: A Sino-Japanese kanji pronunciation layer, considered the first Sino-Japanese kanji reading type used in Japan.
